settings.hero_statement: PATINAPATINA is a magazine with stories on art, identity, and culture. It is an embrace of the messiness and confusion of our shared experiences.

settings.title: Join our newsletter!
settings.text: Our monthly letter revisits topics from past PATINAPATINA issues and places them into the context of current events.
